name: Samba De Amigo : Party Central
description:
Get up and shake it on center stage in this vibrant rhythm action game!
Groove to 40 hit songs from the world's most popular genres, with even more arriving as post-launch DLC!
Test your technique in a variety of minigames and challenges.
Strut that style by customizing your character with unique costumes and accessories.
Hit the floor and play online in World Party mode!
Show the world what you've got by competing on the online leaderboards.
